name: DropdownMenu.SubContent

transition.description: A Svelte transition function to use when transitioning the content in and out.
transition.description_zh: 在转换内容时使用的 Svelte 过渡函数。

transitionConfig.description: The configuration to apply to the transition.

inTransition.description: A Svelte transition function to use when transitioning the content in and out.
inTransition.description_zh: 在转换内容时使用的 Svelte 过渡函数。

inTransitionConfig.description: The configuration to apply to the transition.

outTransition.description: A Svelte transition function to use when transitioning the content in and out.
outTransition.description_zh: 在转换内容时使用的 Svelte 过渡函数。

outTransitionConfig.description: The configuration to apply to the transition.

side.description: The preferred side of the anchor to render against when open. Will be reversed when collisions occur. Floating UI reference.
side.description_zh: 打开时要渲染的锚点的首选一侧。发生碰撞时将反转。浮动 UI 引用。

sideOffset.description: The amount of offset to apply to the menu's position on the x-axis. Floating UI reference.
sideOffset.description_zh: 要应用于菜单在 x 轴上的位置的偏移量。浮动 UI 引用。

align.description: The preferred alignment of the anchor to render against when open. Floating UI reference.
align.description_zh: 打开时要呈现的锚点的首选对齐方式。浮动 UI 引用。

alignOffset.description: An offset in pixels from the 'start' or 'end' alignment options. Floating UI reference.
alignOffset.description_zh: “开始”或“结束”对齐选项的偏移量（以像素为单位）。浮动 UI 引用。

avoidCollisions.description: When true, overrides the side and align options to prevent collisions with the boundary edges. Floating UI reference.
avoidCollisions.description_zh: 如果为 true，则覆盖边和对齐选项，以防止与边界边发生冲突。浮动 UI 引用。

collisionBoundary.description: A boundary element or array of elements to check for collisions against. Floating UI reference.
collisionBoundary.description_zh: 要检查碰撞的边界元素或元素数组。浮动 UI 引用。

collisionPadding.description: The amount in pixels of virtual padding around the viewport edges to check for overflow which will cause a collision. Floating UI reference.
collisionPadding.description_zh: 视口边缘周围的虚拟填充量（以像素为单位），用于检查是否存在会导致冲突的溢出。浮动 UI 引用。

fitViewport.description: Whether the floating element should be constrained to the viewport. Floating UI reference.
fitViewport.description_zh: 是否应将浮动元素限制在视口内。浮动 UI 引用。

sameWidth.description: Whether the content should be the same width as the trigger. Floating UI reference.
sameWidth.description_zh: 内容是否应与触发器的宽度相同。浮动 UI 引用。

strategy.description: The positioning strategy to use for the floating element. Floating UI reference.
strategy.description_zh: 用于浮动元素的定位策略。浮动 UI 引用。

overlap.description: Whether the floating element can overlap the reference element. Floating UI reference.
overlap.description_zh: 浮动元素是否可以与参考元素重叠。浮动 UI 引用。

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: 是否对此组件使用渲染委派。

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: 正在呈现的基础 DOM 元素。您可以绑定到此元素以编程方式与元素进行交互。

description: The submenu content displayed when the parent submenu is open.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: 如果使用带有委托的 asChild 属性，则要应用于元素的构建器属性和操作。
